00071 class Partitioning
00072 {
00073 public:
00087         Partitioning(int numberOfPartitions, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target)
00088         {
00089                 partitions = numberOfPartitions;
00090                 int ec = input.dim(0);
00091                 int dimension = input.dim(1);
00092                 int i, e, d;
00093 
00094                 SIZE_CHECK(input.ndim() == 2);
00095                 SIZE_CHECK(target.ndim() == 2);
00096                 SIZE_CHECK(target.dim(0) == ec);
00097 
00098                 part_index.resize(ec, false);
00099                 part_train_input.resize(partitions, false);
00100                 part_train_target.resize(partitions, false);
00101                 part_validation_input.resize(partitions, false);
00102                 part_validation_target.resize(partitions, false);
00103 
00104                 int l_plus = 0;
00105                 int l_minus = 0;
00106                 for (e=0; e<ec; e++) if (target(e) > 0.0) l_plus++; else l_minus++;
00107 
00108                 Array<int> t(partitions);
00109                 Array<int> v_plus(partitions);
00110                 Array<int> v_minus(partitions);
00111                 int nn_plus = l_plus / partitions;
00112                 int c_plus = l_plus - nn_plus * partitions;
00113                 int nn_minus = l_minus / partitions;
00114                 int c_minus = l_minus - nn_minus * partitions;
00115                 for (i=0; i<partitions; i++)
00116                 {
00117                         v_plus(i) = nn_plus;
00118                         v_minus(i) = nn_minus;
00119                         if (i < c_plus) v_plus(i)++;
00120                         if (i < c_minus) v_minus(i)++;
00121                         t(i) = ec - v_plus(i) - v_minus(i);
00122                         part_train_input[i] = new Array<double>(t(i), dimension);
00123                         part_train_target[i] = new Array<double>(t(i));
00124                         part_validation_input[i] = new Array<double>(v_plus(i) + v_minus(i), dimension);
00125                         part_validation_target[i] = new Array<double>(v_plus(i) + v_minus(i));
00126                 }
00127                 int c;
00128                 for (e=0; e<ec; e++)
00129                 {
00130                         if (target(e) > 0.0)
00131                         {
00132                                 do
00133                                 {
00134                                         c = Rng::discrete(0, partitions - 1);
00135                                 }
00136                                 while (v_plus(c) == 0);
00137                                 v_plus(c)--;
00138                         }
00139                         else
00140                         {
00141                                 do
00142                                 {
00143                                         c = Rng::discrete(0, partitions - 1);
00144                                 }
00145                                 while (v_minus(c) == 0);
00146                                 v_minus(c)--;
00147                         }
00148                         part_index(e) = c;
00149 
00150                         for (d=0; d<dimension; d++) part_validation_input[c]->operator () (v_plus(c) + v_minus(c), d) = input(e, d);
00151                         part_validation_target[c]->operator () (v_plus(c) + v_minus(c)) = target(e);
00152 
00153                         for (i=0; i<partitions; i++)
00154                         {
00155                                 if (i == c) continue;
00156                                 t(i)--;
00157                                 for (d=0; d<dimension; d++) part_train_input[i]->operator () (t(i), d) = input(e, d);
00158                                 part_train_target[i]->operator () (t(i)) = target(e);
00159                         }
00160                 }
00161         }
00162 
00164         ~Partitioning()
00165         {
00166                 int i;
00167                 for (i=0; i<partitions; i++)
00168                 {
00169                         delete part_train_input[i];
00170                         delete part_train_target[i];
00171                         delete part_validation_input[i];
00172                         delete part_validation_target[i];
00173                 }
00174         }
00175 
00176 
00178         inline int getNumberOfPartitions()
00179         {
00180                 return partitions;
00181         }
00182 
00184         inline const Array<double>& train_input(int index)
00185         {
00186                 return *(part_train_input[index]);
00187         }
00188 
00190         inline const Array<double>& train_target(int index)
00191         {
00192                 return *(part_train_target[index]);
00193         }
00194 
00196         inline const Array<double>& validation_input(int index)
00197         {
00198                 return *(part_validation_input[index]);
00199         }
00200 
00202         inline const Array<double>& validation_target(int index)
00203         {
00204                 return *(part_validation_target[index]);
00205         }
00206 
00208         inline int getIndex(int example)
00209         {
00210                 return part_index(example);
00211         }
00212 
00213 protected:
00215         int partitions;
00216 
00218         Array<int> part_index;
00219 
00221         std::vector< Array<double>* > part_train_input;
00222 
00224         std::vector< Array<double>* > part_train_target;
00225 
00227         std::vector< Array<double>* > part_validation_input;
00228 
00230         std::vector< Array<double>* > part_validation_target;
00231 };

00250 class CVModel : public Model

00256         CVModel(Array<Model*>& models)
00257         {
00258                 SIZE_CHECK(models.ndim() == 1);
00259                 SIZE_CHECK(models.dim(0) > 1);
00260 
00261                 int p, pc = models(0)->getParameterDimension();
00262 
00263 #ifdef DEBUG
00264                 int i, ic = models.dim(0);
00265                 for (i=1; i<ic; i++) SIZE_CHECK(models.getParameterDimension() == pc);
00266 #endif
00267 
00268                 baseModel = models;
00269                 baseModelIndex = 0;
00270 
00271                 parameter.resize(pc);
00272                 for (p=0; p<pc; p++) parameter(p) = models(0)->getParameter(p);
00273         }
00274 
00276         ~CVModel()
00277         {
00278         }
00279 
00280 
00282         void setParameter(unsigned int index, double value)
00283         {
00284                 Model::setParameter(index, value);
00285 
00286                 int i, ic = baseModel.dim(0);
00287                 for (i=0; i<ic; i++) baseModel(i)->setParameter(index, value);
00288         }
00289 
00291         void setBaseModel(int index)
00292         {
00293                 RANGE_CHECK(index >= 0 && index < baseModel.dim(0));
00294                 baseModelIndex = index;
00295         }
00296 
00298         inline Model& getBaseModel()
00299         {
00300                 return *baseModel(baseModelIndex);
00301         }
00302 
00304         void model(const Array<double>& input, Array<double>& output)
00305         {
00306                 baseModel(baseModelIndex)->model(input, output);
00307         }
00308 
00310         void modelDerivative(const Array<double>& input, Array<double>& derivative)
00311         {
00312                 baseModel(baseModelIndex)->modelDerivative(input, derivative);
00313         }
00314 
00316         void modelDerivative(const Array<double>& input, Array<double>& output, Array<double>& derivative)
00317         {
00318                 baseModel(baseModelIndex)->modelDerivative(input, output, derivative);
00319         }

00323         {
00324                 return getBaseModel().isFeasible();

00347 class CVError : public ErrorFunction
00348 {
00349 public:
00356         CVError(Partitioning& part, ErrorFunction& error, Optimizer& optimizer, int iter)
00357         : partitioning(part)
00358         , baseError(error)
00359         , baseOptimizer(optimizer)
00360         {
00361                 iterations = iter;
00362         }
00363 
00365         ~CVError()
00366         {
00367         }
00368 
00369 
00376         double error(Model& model, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target)
00377         {
00378                 CVModel* pCVM = dynamic_cast<CVModel*>(&model);
00379                 if (pCVM == NULL) throw "[CVError::error] invalid model";
00380 
00381                 SIZE_CHECK(input.ndim() == 2);
00382                 SIZE_CHECK(target.ndim() == 1);
00383                 SIZE_CHECK(target.dim(0) == input.dim(0));
00384 
00385                 double err, ret = 0.0;
00386                 int t, it, parts = partitioning.getNumberOfPartitions();
00387                 int p, pc = model.getParameterDimension();
00388                 Array<double> train_input;
00389                 Array<double> train_target;
00390                 Array<double> validation_input;
00391                 Array<double> validation_target;
00392                 Array<double> initial_param(pc);
00393 
00394                 // loop through the partitions
00395                 // std::cout << "[" << std::flush;
00396                 for (t=0; t<parts; t++)
00397                 {
00398                         // std::cout << "<" << std::flush;
00399                         // activate the t-th submodel
00400                         pCVM->setBaseModel(t);
00401 
00402                         // do the training
00403                         baseOptimizer.init(pCVM->getBaseModel());
00404                         for (it=0; it<iterations; it++)
00405                         {
00406                                 baseOptimizer.optimize(pCVM->getBaseModel(), baseError, partitioning.train_input(t), partitioning.train_target(t));
00407                         }
00408 
00409                         // compute the validation error
00410                         err = baseError.error(pCVM->getBaseModel(), partitioning.validation_input(t), partitioning.validation_target(t));
00411                         ret += err;
00412                         // std::cout << err << ">" << std::flush;
00413                 }
00414                 // std::cout << "]" << std::flush;
00415 
00416                 // return the mean error
00417                 return ret / parts;
00418         }
00419 
00420         double errorDerivative(Model& model, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target, Array<double>& derivative)
00421         {
00422                 CVModel* pCVM = dynamic_cast<CVModel*>(&model);
00423                 if (pCVM == NULL) throw "[CVError::errorDerivative] invalid model";
00424 
00425                 SIZE_CHECK(input.ndim() == 2);
00426                 SIZE_CHECK(target.ndim() == 1);
00427                 SIZE_CHECK(target.dim(0) == input.dim(0));
00428 
00429                 double err, ret = 0.0;
00430                 int t, it, parts = partitioning.getNumberOfPartitions();
00431                 int p, pc = model.getParameterDimension();
00432                 Array<double> train_input;
00433                 Array<double> train_target;
00434                 Array<double> validation_input;
00435                 Array<double> validation_target;
00436                 Array<double> initial_param(pc);
00437                 Array<double> innerDerivative;
00438 
00439                 derivative.resize(pc, false);
00440                 derivative = 0.0;
00441 
00442                 // loop through the partitions
00443                 for (t=0; t<parts; t++)
00444                 {
00445                         // activate the t-th submodel
00446                         pCVM->setBaseModel(t);
00447 
00448                         // do the training
00449                         baseOptimizer.init(pCVM->getBaseModel());
00450                         for (it=0; it<iterations; it++)
00451                         {
00452                                 baseOptimizer.optimize(pCVM->getBaseModel(), baseError, partitioning.train_input(t), partitioning.train_target(t));
00453                         }
00454 
00455                         // compute the validation error
00456                         err = baseError.errorDerivative(pCVM->getBaseModel(), partitioning.validation_input(t), partitioning.validation_target(t), innerDerivative);
00457                         for (p=0; p<pc; p++) derivative(p) += innerDerivative(p);
00458                         ret += err;
00459                 }
00460 
00461                 // return the mean derivative
00462                 for (p=0; p<pc; p++) derivative(p) = derivative(p) / parts;
00463 
00464                 // return the mean error
00465                 return ret / parts;
00466         }
00467 
00468 protected:
00470         Partitioning& partitioning;
00471
